reference.shortdesc: The varname element identifies a variable that is supplied to a software application.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The varname element is specialized from keyword. It is defined in the software domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the varname element is used to identify variables that represent the "installation directory," "project directory," and "file name".
